defining_moments.title: The Unexpected Debate Turnaround
defining_moments.description: In the final round of a debate tournament, my partner fell ill, leaving me to handle both roles. Navigating this challenge alone taught me resilience and adaptability under pressure.

defining_moments.title: Finding My Voice in Debate
defining_moments.description: Initially terrified of public speaking, I joined the debate team to conquer my fear. Over time, I transformed fear into confidence, learning to articulate my thoughts with clarity and conviction.

defining_moments.title: Debate: A Lesson in Empathy
defining_moments.description: Arguing both sides of contentious issues in debate taught me to appreciate diverse perspectives. This experience deepened my empathy and understanding of complex societal issues.
